meanings.definition: A ring of fibrocartilage around the socket of a joint.
meanings.sent1: The labrums in my knee help cushion the joint.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the labrums in my shoulder were torn.
meanings.sent3: The labrums in the joint were like little shock absorbers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as the labrums in a joint.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the labrums in my elbow working as I lifted the heavy box.

meanings.definition: A lip or edge, such as the upper or lower lip of a flower.
meanings.sent1: The labrums of the tulip petals were delicate and colorful.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate labrums of the orchid blooms.
meanings.sent3: The labrums of the flower seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The labrums of the rose petals glistened with dew.
meanings.sent5: The labrums of the daisy added a touch of elegance to the garden.
